yedawuma pasuwa (4.2 sanskaranaya) 2010 aprel 20 eksath rajadhaniye da, ostriyawa, beljiyama, kanadawa, denmarkaya, pranshaya, jarmaniya, ithaliya, nedarlanthaya, pruthugalaya, spanynyaya saha switsarlanthaya sandaha 2010 juni 9 dina da nikuth karana ladi.[5]
"mama thaniyen hari yanawa ooka gana hoyanna" kiyapu daham gedara katitiyage wiruddathwayath nothaka yanawa sadunige gamata, gihin sadunige gedarata giyath gedara aya dahamwa banala elawa gannawa.
meya 1996di ewakata wipakshaye siti awami ligaya chandaya warjanaya kala awasthawehi warthawu siyayata 25 aduma pa්rathishathayata wada sulu washayen wadi pa්ramanayaki.
thira nathi diwiyaki me loke githaya sajiwiwa gayana karamin mama guwanwiduli githa kshethrayata ek wuna.
thawa tika dawasakin lak wasiyanta hithe gindarak nathiwa jiwathwiya haki ya.
me athara elambaena kabinat mandala raswimedi thel mila wadi kirima gana dirghawa sakachcha kirimatada siyalu parshwa ekanga wiya.
ema granthaya namkota aththe jana ranjana ranjan yanuweni.
mama harima kammali wadak me kare..
ehen kalakanni hindu dewiwarunwa dalada maligawe oban dharmaya winasa karanawa, mehen umbaala loketa penna api bauddha neme, api wishwawasiyo kiya kiya salli higakanawa.

kese namuth pakshaya ee sambandhayen methek kisidu awasana thiranayakata elambaa nathi bawa awadharanaya karana ehimiyo, 'mahinda chinthana' prathipaththiyen ekanga wi thibena prathipaththi kriyathmaka karana men aanduwata bala kirima pinisa wiruddha paksha saha siwil samaja sanwidhana samanga ekwa labana badada kolambaadi dawantha raliyak pawathwana bawada bibisi sandeshayata pawasuha.
